craj

Class ReferenceCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • craj.ReferenceCircle

  • public class ReferenceCircle
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the perfect circle which holds the maximum cross value and cross count a circle with the same diameter could possibly have.
    Author:
    Alexander Johr u26865 m18927, Caroline Rühling u26864 m18926

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int diameter
      the diameter of the to be created reference circle
      int minBlackValue
      the minimum black value in which a circle with the same diameter should be considered a circle
      int minCrossCount
      the minimum cross count in which a circle with the same diameter should be considered a circle
      int minCrossValue
      the minimum cross value in which a circle with the same diameter should be considered a circle
      static int REFERENCE_BLACK_VALUE 
      int referenceCrossCount
      The cross count that was calculated for this perfect reference circle

      The cross value that was calculated for this perfect reference circle
